parameters: \n<\n[1]> \af[1] \N[2] isn't in here,\. I should get going.
The moment Neneko steps foot inside the basement she freezes in her tracks,\. tail rising stiffly in alarm.\.\.
Instead of a normal basement or storage room,\. this place felt more like some sort of twisted lab...\.\.\.
Melmos.\.\. A bunch of them,\. locked up,\. most of them unconscious...\.\.\. or worse,\. and even the ones that were awake seemed ill or exhausted.\.\.
\n<Neneko>That witch!!\.\. What's she doing here?\.\. I knew she was hiding something,\. but...\.\.\. wow,\. she's really sick if this is what her basement looks...
\n<Neneko>Who knows what else sheâ€™s hiding...\.\.\.\.\. \BST[3]if she has something to do with those kidnappers,\. then...!
Neneko hisses,\. her claws coming out as she starts assuming the worst...\.\.\.
If that witch knew where her brother was,\. if all of this had something to do with him,\. she would!!\.\.
\n<Kaere>*Sigh*...\.\.\. You know,\. breaking and entering isn't very acceptable even outside of the city,\. cat.\.\.

The feline quickly turns around...\.\.\. maybe too quickly,\. as she trips on the slippery steps of the witch's "basement".\.\. Instead,\. Kaere simply stands by the stairwell,\. looking rather annoyed.\.\.
\n<Kaere>I knew you weren't a regular customer,\. but you could have at least bought a few things before you decided to trespass and uncover all my secrets,\. as a courtesy.\.\.
\n<Neneko>Tsk...\.\.\. quit playing around,\. what is all of this!?\.\. Why've you got monsters in your basement like some kinda gallery,\. huh?
The girl sighs,\. clutching her staff as she steps forward,\. looking towards the Melmos.\.\.
\n<Kaere>If you must know...\.\.\. this is all part of my personal research.\.\. I'm studying these creatures of Mana.\.\.
Neneko scoffs,\. a hand on her hip.\.\.
\n<Neneko>Does studying them involve boxing 'em away and torturing them?\.\. Cuz from what I'm lookin' at that's all I see.\.\.
\n<Kaere>As a matter of fact,\. yes.\.\. But I wouldn't expect you to understand.\.\.
Rather than confrontational,\. Kaere just answers flatly,\. shrugging her shoulders.\.\.
Obviously,\. this rubs Neneko the wrong way,\. as the cat stomps forward,\. invading the witch's personal face and glaring at her.\.\.
\n<Neneko>You're talkin' real casual for someone who got busted.\.\.\.\. \BST[3]Quit messing around and tell me what you're doing here!\.\.
\n<Kaere>Why?\.\. It's none of your business what I do in my home...\.\.\.
She grabs the girl's collar.\.\. Kaere looks down at her claws for a moment before looking back into the cat getting in her face,\. pouting.\.\.
\n<Neneko>Wrong answer,\. witch!\.\. I think it is my business!\.\. Tell me what you know!\.\. Who're you working for,\. huh!?
\n<Kaere>Actually,\. I think it's the right answer!\.\. What I'm doing here has nothing to do with you,\. and it's not harming anyone.\.\.
The girl staaaaares at Neneko,\. defiant.\.\.
\n<Neneko>What,\. you really telling me you have all this and you ain't involved with those guys!?\.\.
\n<Kaere>I have no idea who you mean by "those guys",\. but considering the only people I'm "involved" with are the people who buy my goods,\. I think I'm allowed to say no.\.\.
As much as she wants to thrash the annoyingly stoic girl,\. she can't get a read on any lies from her.\.\.
\n<Neneko>...\.\.\. If these experiments have anything to do with my brother,\. whatever you did to those Melmos will look like a luxury compared to what I'll do to you.\.\.
Neneko lets go of the witch,\. who carefully straightens her dress.\.\. The cat rubs her eyes as she steps away,\. frustrated.\.\.
\n<Kaere>I suppose I'll have to answer them,\. considering the situation...\.\.\.
\n<Neneko>Huff.\.\. What're you doing out here if you're not with them?\.\.
\n<Kaere>...\.\.\. Well,\. if by "them" you mean the City authorities,\. I'm out here specifically because I'm not with them.\.\.

\n<Kaere>*Sigh*...\.\.\. You're an outsider,\. so I guess you don't really know how things work in there,\. but the...\.\.\. \BST[7]powers that be within the City keep a very tight leash on all things Mana.\.\.
Kaere lowers her hat,\. pacing across the room,\. gazing at the contained monsters.\.\.
\n<Kaere>Treasures,\. spellcasting,\. even studying or researching Mana is banned without their approval.\.\.
She turns around and puffs up her cheeks.\.\.

\n<Kaere>This research is very important to me,\. and those guys would probably either kick me out,\. throw me in a cell,\. or find out how to profit off of me instead of actually letting me do this!\.\.
\n<Neneko>Hmph,\. fine,\. whatever.\.\. I don't care what kinda messed up passion projects you're cooking down here on your own time if it's got nothing to do with me.
\n<Neneko>Look,\. I'm looking for my brother.\.\. Short,\. bratty.\.\. Buncha bastards took him.\.\. You know anything?\.\.
\n<Kaere>Haven't seen any kids out here,\. no.\.\. And the most I get are single travellers,\. not groups.\.\. The people you're looking for didn't come this way.\.\.
\n<Kaere>...\.\.\. Most likely,\. they took him to the City,\. though.\.\. They probably plan on sending him into the Hole...\.\.\.
\n<Kaere>Mm.\.\. He's probably already been sent in.\.\. That Company doesn't like wasting time with their 'help'.\.\.
Kaere huffs,\. looking disgusted.\.\. Neneko doesn't notice,\. though,\. shaking with worry.\.\.
\n<Kaere>...\.\.\. You're an outcast,\. you'll have eyes on you the moment you step into the city.\.\. I doubt you'd even be able to get near the entrance down to the Hole's First Stratum.\.\.
\n<Kaere>Grrr...\.\.\. fine then,\. what should I do!?\.\. \BST[7]You sure know a whole lot for being an outcast!\.\.
\n<Kaere>...\.\.\. I...\.\.\. may have a way in.\.\. Really,\. the tricky part is getting past the guards and getting inside.\.\.
\n<Kaere>Once you're at the First Stratum I doubt they'd have the forces or time to deal with "intruders".\.\. Even the top floors are death traps for the unprepared or unfocused.\.\.
\n<Neneko>So it'll be fine as long as I can get in,\. is what you're saying.\.\.
\n<Kaere>"Fine" isn't how I'd put it,\. but yes...\.\.\. \BST[1]at the very least you wouldn't have to worry about the guards down there,\. just the ones above ground.\.\.
\n<Neneko>Hm hm...\.\.\. fine then!\.\. What's the plan?\.\.
\n<Kaere>First,\. you can't tell anyone about my experiments.\.\. If the authorities bust me all my research will be gone!\.\.
\n<Neneko>Hah...\.\.\. so you're buying my silence,\. huh?\.\.
\n<Kaere>I just need to make sure I can trust you if I'm going to help you.\.\.
She nods to herself,\. then clears her throat.\.\.
\n<Kaere>Second; you have to do what I say.\.\. \BST[1]You have to trust me if we're doing this.\.\.
\n<Kaere>Your brother is in there and who knows how long he'll survive.\.\. You need to trust me if you want to chase him down!\.\.
\n<Neneko>...\.\.\. Ngh...\.\.\. ugh,\. fine,\. I'll follow your lead,\.\.\. \BST[3]but you better not screw me!\.\.
\n<Kaere>I won't.\.\. I have a stake in this too,\. after all.\.\.

\n<Kaere>There's an Alchemy Store in the City,\. "Anemone's Bloom".\.\. The manager there is a friend of mine.\.\. Meet me outside it at night when you're ready for the plan.\.\. Don't keep me...\.\.\. or your brother,\. waiting for too long.\.\.
\n<Neneko>Fine,\. but you better be sure about this!\.\.
\n<Kaere>I am!\.\. Go,\. I need to prepare some things...\.\.\.
Neneko glares at the witch,\. before silently turning and making her way up the stairs,\. leaving Kaere behind.\.\.
\n<Kaere>...\.\.\. This might be my chance...\.\.\. \BST[7]I need to hurry and get ready...\.\.\.
Resolute,\. she nods to herself and gathers her things.\.\.
